text: The Centre for Cities is a non-partisan urban policy research unit in London, United Kingdom. The organization was established in 2005 as a part of the Institute for Public Policy Research. It became independent in 2007. The Centre for Cities was established to understand and solve urban problems in the United Kingdom cities. Centre for Cities publishes an annual report on 64 major cities. == References == == Other websites == * Centre for Cities Category:Urban planning organizations Category:Organisations based in London Category:2005 establishments in the United Kingdom
title: Centre for Cities
